column5: Charming condo now available in the center of Downtown Austin! Donâ€™t worry about downtown parking, there is a dedicated parking spot with this unit! Extremely convenient location across the street from the convention center and just blocks away from the train and several bus stops. You'll be within walking distance to the best of what Austin has to offer including 6th Street, Rainey Street, South Congress, several hiking trails and parks, and more. There is truly something here for everyone!
column8: Beautiful Apt in the middle of Downtown Austin!
